entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
